about_the_game:
“High-spec fox swordswoman… It's Lady Natsume Kamishiro!”

VTuber "Natsume Kamishiro" stars in an ASMR visual novel game!
Set out on a monster-slaying adventure with the innocent and carefree fox spirit Natsume!
Some of the lines are recorded in an ASMR, allowing you to enjoy intimate and rich communication with Natsume Kamishiro.



🌸 Story 🌸
The fox spirit "Natsume Kamishiro" is both your partner and a long-time childhood friend with a complicated history.
As demon hunters you both bear the significant responsibility of "exorcising demons" to protect the town.

However...
Natsume, under the guise of a "patrol" around the city, will drag you all over the place.
A shopping district with an amusement park!? A park with a pool!? A card shop!? For Natsume, dealing with monsters is of no concern!

High-spec and bewitching! Even while being tossed around by the carefree Natsume, you’ll still carry out your duty of monster extermination…

🌸 Characters 🌸

Natsume Kamishiro
CV: Natsume Kamishiro

"Alright, let’s go play right away... I mean, let’s go on patrol!"

High-spec and bewitching! Even while being tossed around by the innocent and carefree Natsume, you carry out your duty of fighting against monsters...
A childhood friend who loves you very much and never misses a day of showing their affection.



🌸 SPECIAL THANKS 🌸
Starring: Natsume Kamishiro
Illustrator: Yasuyuki
🌟🌟🌟All the fans!!!🌟🌟🌟

🌸Recommended For🌸
✅VTubers or ASMR Lovers
✅Those who want a heartwarming story
✅Those who enjoy passionate, adventurous stories or manga

🐇 Novel Game Brand "Rabbitfoot” 🐇

A novel game brand that delivers novel games casting active YouTubers and VTubers as game characters.
As well as using their names and nicknames, you can enjoy the different sides of your faves and feel a close connection through the novel game that you cannot experience in the usual streaming or video uploads.

content_descriptors.notes: Parts of the game include scenes of girls in swimsuits at the pool and situations in which they are approached by girls who are overly fond of them. Sexual acts and nudity do not appear.

short_description: VTuber "Natsume Kamishiro" stars in an ASMR visual novel game! Set out on a monster-slaying adventure with the innocent and carefree fox spirit Natsume!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
